ComicInfo.Title: Lie in the Darkness; Locas; [Untitled]; It's Not All Love; [Untitled]; Not Today, You Don't
ComicInfo.Summary:
Still the world’s greatest comics magazine, hot off the heels of an Emmy nomination for the PBS documentary, Love and Rockets: The Great American Comic Book! Featuring four all-new stories from Eisner Hall of Famers Gilbert and Jaime Hernandez. Fritz remakes her mother Maria’s movie twice and both versions are included in Gilbert’s half of the issue, with murder, belly dancers, and plutonium all in the mix! Meanwhile, over in Jaime’s half, Maggie wants to hang out with kids her own age, while the new Princess Animus wants to eat kids her own age!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Gilbert Hernandez | 1 | RE | Fantagraphics Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 400 | Jaime Hernandez | 2 |
